meanings.definition: Flinkites: a group of people who are known for their quick thinking and resourcefulness.
meanings.sent1: The flinkites in our team always come up with clever solutions to problems.
meanings.sent2: The flinkites gathered around the table to brainstorm ideas for the project.
meanings.sent3: The flinkites at the office were like a team of problem-solving superheroes.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, the flinkites are the ones who can turn challenges into opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The flinkites' ability to think on their feet sets them apart in any situation.

meanings.definition: Flinkites: to exhibit characteristics of being quick-witted and adaptable.
meanings.sent1: She flinkites her way through tough situations with ease.
meanings.sent2: He always flinkites whenever faced with unexpected changes.
meanings.sent3: The comedian flinkites his jokes to suit the audience's reactions.
meanings.sent4: Like a chameleon, she flinkites her personality to fit any social setting.
meanings.sent5: In times of crisis, the true leaders flinkites to guide others effectively.
